definitions.definition: of or involving preference or partiality; constituting a favor or privilege.
examples: preferential interest rates may be offered to employees
synonyms: biased "we were not expecting this preferential treatment"

definitions.definition: (of a union shop) giving employment preference to union members.
(of voting or an election) in which the voter puts candidates in order of preference.
(of a creditor) having a claim on the receipt of payment from a debtor that will be met before those of other creditors.
